es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.mf.rec

Class MFRecommender<U,I>

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.rec.AbstractRecommender<U,I>
      • es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.rec.fast.AbstractFastRecommender<U,I>
        • es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.mf.rec.MFRecommender<U,I>
  • Type Parameters:
    U - type of the users
    I - type of the items
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ItemIndex<I>, UserIndex<U>, FastItemIndex<I>, FastUserIndex<U>, FastRecommender<U,I>, Recommender<U,I>

    public class MFRecommender<U,I>
extends AbstractFastRecommender<U,I>
    Matrix factorization recommender. Scores are calculated as the inner product of user and item vectors.
    Author:
    Sa√∫l Vargas (saul.vargas@uam.es)

      • getRecommendation

        public FastRecommendation getRecommendation(int uidx,
                                            int maxLength,
                                            IntPredicate filter)
        Description copied from interface: FastRecommender
        Filter recommendation. Recommends only the items that pass the filter up to a maximum list size.
        Specified by:
        getRecommendation in interface FastRecommender<U,I>
        Specified by:
        getRecommendation in class AbstractFastRecommender<U,I>
        Parameters:
        uidx - index of the user to be issued a recommendation
        maxLength - maximum length of recommendation, set to 0 for no limit
        filter - (fast) filter to decide which items might be recommended
        Returns:
        a (fast) recommendation list
